Package jMidiSequencerBeta.util

Class MusicReader

    A helper to read music data and construct a music composition from it.

    • Method Detail

      • parseFile

        public static <T> T parseFile​(java.lang.Readable readable,
                              CompositionBuilder<T> piece)
        A factory for producing new music compositions, given a source of music and a builder for constructing compositions.

        The input file format consists of two types of lines:

        • Tempo lines: the keyword "tempo" followed by a number, describing the tempo in microseconds per beat
        • Note lines: the keyword "note" followed by five numbers indicating the start and end times of the note, the instrument, the pitch, and the volume

        Type Parameters:
        T - The main model interface type describing music compositions
        Parameters:
        readable - The source of data for the music composition
        piece - A builder for helping to construct a new composition
